meanings.definition: Mosasaurs: Large extinct marine reptiles of the late Cretaceous period.
meanings.sent1: The museum had a fascinating exhibit on mosasaurs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of mosasaurs to learn about ancient sea creatures.
meanings.sent3: The mosasaurs at the museum seemed to be having a deep conversation in their display.
meanings.sent4: Her love for mosasaurs was as vast as the ocean they once inhabited.
meanings.sent5: The image of mosasaurs swimming gracefully through the water is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: Mosasaurs: A group of carnivorous aquatic reptiles.
meanings.sent1: The documentary showcased the hunting skills of mosasaurs.
meanings.sent2: The mosasaurs in the movie were depicted as fierce predators of the sea.
meanings.sent3: The mosasaurs decided to have a seafood feast to celebrate their successful hunt.
meanings.sent4: The mosasaurs' stealth in the water was likened to that of a ninja.
meanings.sent5: The sight of mosasaurs gliding through the waves was both majestic and terrifying.
